briefTitle: Adalimumab in Adult Japanese Subjects With Psoriasis

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

\- Participants who completed Study M04-688 (NCT00338754)

Exclusion Criteria:

\- Participant is considered by the investigator, for any reason, to be an unsuitable candidate for the study

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With a 50% Reduction in PASI (Psoriasis Area and Severity Index) Score Compared With Baseline PASI Score (PASI50 Response)
outcomeMeasures.description: PASI scores range from 0 (best outcome) to 72 (worst outcome including erythema, induration, desquamation, and area affected). Baseline is defined as the last available PASI value prior to the first dose of study drug (adalimumab or placebo) in Study M04-688 (NCT00338754).

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With a 75% Reduction in PASI (Psoriasis Area and Severity Index) Score Compared With Baseline PASI Score (PASI75 Response)
